
 Dogsay version (2.2.0)

 Usage:
    dogsay --help                                     Show this message
    dogsay --version                                  Print out the installed version of dogsay
    dogsay --use [<name>]                             Enter a name to select the graphic
    dogsay ls                                         Lists all graphic names
    dogsay ls -d                                      Lists all shapes and names
    dogsay set-colors [<code>] [<code>]               Set colors for graphics and text
                                                      Color codes:
                                                      \u001b[30mk = black\u001b[0m
                                                      \u001b[31mr = red\u001b[0m
                                                      \u001b[32mg = green\u001b[0m
                                                      \u001b[33my = yellow\u001b[0m
                                                      \u001b[34mb = blue\u001b[0m
                                                      \u001b[35mm = magenta\u001b[0m
                                                      \u001b[36mc = cyan\u001b[0m
                                                      \u001b[37mw = white\u001b[0m

    Example:
        dogsay --use snoopy                            Set the graph to snoopy
        dogsay set-colors r                            Set text and graphics to red
        dogsay set-colors g y                          Set text to green and graphics to yellow
